name: v0.4.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_protoc", version = "0.4.0")

# Optional: choose a version of protoc rather than the latest.
protoc = use_extension("@toolchains_protoc//protoc:extensions.bzl", "protoc")
protoc.toolchain(
    # Creates a repository to satisfy well-known-types dependencies such as
    # deps=["@com_google_protobuf//:any_proto"]
    google_protobuf = "com_google_protobuf",
    # Pin to any version of protoc
    version = "v26.0",
)
use_repo(protoc, "com_google_protobuf", "toolchains_protoc_hub")

register_toolchains("@toolchains_protoc_hub//:all")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_protoc",
    sha256 = "270ff656a305e8e2fef22628a13b948554f80c69f53b47dfa7bf09cd99743062",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_protoc-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/releases/download/v0.4.0/toolchains_protoc-v0.4.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# toolchains_protoc setup #
######################
# Fetches the toolchains_protoc dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@toolchains_protoc//protoc:repositories.bzl", "rules_protoc_dependencies")

rules_protoc_dependencies()

load("@rules_proto//proto:repositories.bzl", "rules_proto_dependencies")

rules_proto_dependencies()

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@toolchains_protoc//protoc:toolchain.bzl", "protoc_toolchains")

protoc_toolchains(
    name = "protoc_toolchains",
    version = "v25.3",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/46
* chore: upgrade rules_uv by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/45
* feat: re-enable Python example of using pre-built protoc by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/42
* chore: update example to latest bazel deps by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/49
* chore(deps): update to new rules_python RC by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/50
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/51
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/52
* feat: add examples of Rust and TypeScript by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/53
* fix: break protobuf and grpc building from source by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/54
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/55
* Remove git_override for rules_python by @jklukas in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/56
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/57
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/63
* chore: publish attestations to BCR by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/65

## New Contributors
* @thesayyn made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/54
* @jklukas made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/56

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/compare/v0.3.7...v0.4.0

```starlark
load("@rules_proto//proto:repositories.bzl", "rules_proto_dependencies")

rules_proto_dependencies()

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@toolchains_protoc//protoc:toolchain.bzl", "protoc_toolchains")

protoc_toolchains(
    name = "protoc_toolchains",
    version = "v25.3",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/7
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/8
* feat: add Go example by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/10
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/11
* feat: default to latest protobuf rather than pinning by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/pull/12


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/compare/v0.2.4...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.4
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_protoc", version = "0.2.4")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark

    name = "toolchains_protoc",
    sha256 = "1f3cd768bbb92164952301228bac5e5079743843488598f2b17fecd41163cadb",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_protoc-0.2.4",

)

######################
# toolchains_protoc setup #
######################
# Fetches the toolchains_protoc dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@toolchains_protoc//protoc:repositories.bzl", "rules_protoc_dependencies")

rules_protoc_dependencies()

load("@rules_proto//proto:repositories.bzl", "rules_proto_dependencies")

rules_proto_dependencies()

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@toolchains_protoc//protoc:toolchain.bzl", "protoc_toolchains")

protoc_toolchains(
    name = "protoc_toolchains",
    version = "v25.3",
)
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/toolchains_protoc/compare/v0.2.2...v0.2.4
